name: Rotten Tomatoes - dark
description: A dark mode for Rotten Tomatoes
css:
@-moz-document domain("rottentomatoes.com") {
/***** colors used *******************************************
Background 1:		#000000
Background 2:		#1a1a1a
Background 3:		#202020
Background 4:		#282828
Borders:		#323232
Font-color:		#ccc
Link-color:		#2f8cb7
*************************************************************/

/***** borders ************************************************/

/** border #323232 **/ 
#scorePanel .tmeterpanel,
#movies_sidebar,
#movies_sidebar .nav-tabs,
#movies_sidebar .nav-tabs > li:not(:first-of-type),
#miniMOB .rightColumn,
#count-link,
#browser-navigator .navigator-menu,
#footer,  
#tomatometer-info,
#main_movie_sidebar_content,
#rating_widget_desktop .rating_widget_desktop-header,
#FranchiseList .franchiseItemContainer .franchiseItem,
input, button, select, textarea,
blockquote,
hr,
table,
.mb-movies.list-view .mb-movie,
.btn-secondary-rt,
.table > thead > tr > th, 
.table > tbody > tr > th, 
.table > tfoot > tr > th, 
.table > thead > tr > td, 
.table > tbody > tr > td, 
.table > tfoot > tr > td,
.nav-tabs > li.active > a, 
.nav-tabs > li.active > a:hover, 
.nav-tabs > li.active > a:focus,
.lineHeader,
.panel-rt.panel-box,
.review_quote,
.navbar-rt,
.hoverBubble .bubbleContent,
.pagination > li > a, 
.pagination > li > span,
.pagination > .disabled > span, 
.pagination > .disabled > span:hover, 
.pagination > .disabled > span:focus, 
.pagination > .disabled > a, 
.pagination > .disabled > a:hover, 
.pagination > .disabled > a:focus,
.bottom_divider,
.rating_widget .review,
.modal-header,
.btn-default,
.topbar,
.post.original,
.nav-tabs,
.form-control,  
.panel-rt,  
.mb-navigator,
.tb-navigator,
.topbar .topbarItem:first-child,
.topbar > .topbarItem,
.mb-count-panel, 
.Tepisodes .epis-nav ul li,
.Tepisodes .epis-nav,
.Tepisodes .epis-main,
.Tepisodes .epis-main .epis-tbox,
.castSection.borderTop,
.review_table .review_table_row,
.franchiseLink,
.searchResult,
.score_panel .tmeter-panel,
.genrelist li,
.movie_list tr,
.btn-primary-border-dropdown .dropdown-menu li,
.countdown-item,
.userDropdown.dropdown .dropdown-menu.roundMenu .userStats {
    border-color: #323232 !important;} 
            
/** border #444 **/
.post {
    border-bottom: 1px solid #444 !important;}      

div.panel-rt.bannerCaption.subPanel {
    border-left: 5px solid #FA320A !important;
}      
  
/** review quote arrow **/
.review_quote:after,
.review_quote:before {
    border-color: transparent #323232 transparent transparent !important;}

/***** backgrounds ******************************************/

/**393939**/
.top-tv-banner .top-tv-banner-title {
    background-color: #393939}

/** #000 **/
body {
	background-color: #000 !important;}

/** #1a1a1a **/
.container,
.nav > li > a:hover, 
.nav > li > a:focus,
.panel {
	background-color: #1a1a1a !important;}

/** #202020 **/
#movies_sidebar,   
#header, #footer,
#main, 
#count-link #view-icon-grp .view-icon,   
#quotesList .media-body div, 
#mainColumn,
#login .modal-dialog .modal-footer, 
#signup .modal-dialog .modal-footer, 
#signup_email .modal-dialog .modal-footer,
.countdown-index,
input, button, select, textarea,
.nav-tabs > li.active > a, 
.nav-tabs > li.active > a:hover, 
.nav-tabs > li.active > a:focus,
.panel-rt.panel-box,
.lineHeader span,
.pagination > .disabled > span, 
.pagination > .disabled > span:hover, 
.pagination > .disabled > span:focus, 
.pagination > .disabled > a, 
.pagination > .disabled > a:hover, 
.pagination > .disabled > a:focus,
.modal-content,
.topbar,
.post.original,
.pagination>li>a:hover, 
.pagination>li>span:hover, 
.pagination>li>a:focus, 
.pagination>li>span:focus,
.tt-dropdown-menu,
.navbar-rt .navbar-searchbox .tt-input.form-control,
.btn-default,
.dropdown-menu,
.navbar-rt .navbar-nav .menuHeader.showMenu,
.content_box,
.navbar.navbar-rt #menu .menuHeader:hover,
.noReview,
.discussionForum-body,
.score_panel,
.btn-secondary-rt,
.sleaderboard_wrapper,
.panel-rt.bannerCaption.subPanel,
.critic-criteria-container h1.panel-heading, 
h2.panel-heading,
.home-body #videoPanel {
    background-color: #202020 !important;}
        
/** #202020 bg **/
#whatIsTomatometer .title {
    background: #202020;}

/** #282828 **/
#scorePanel,
#movies_sidebar .nav-tabs > li.active, 
#movies_sidebar .nav-tabs > li:hover,
#movies_sidebar .nav-tabs,
#rating_widget_desktop .rating_widget_desktop-header span,
#seasonList .seasonItem,
.pagination > li > a, 
.pagination > li > span,
.review_quote,
.hoverBubble .bubbleContent,
.rating_widget .review,
.table-striped > tbody > tr:nth-child(odd) > td, 
.table-striped > tbody > tr:nth-child(odd) > th,
.grey_content_box,
.comments_quote blockquote,
.form-control,
.Tepisodes .epis-main .epis-tbox,
.ui-widget-content,
.body .ui-autocomplete,
.userDropdown.dropdown .dropdown-menu.roundMenu .userStats:hover,
.dropdown-menu>li>a:focus, 
.dropdown-menu>li>a:hover,
.FullscreenSearch--desktop .FullscreenSearch__result.FullscreenSearch__result--selected,
.gray-movie-block,
.panel-rt.panel .panel-heading, .panel-rt .panel-heading {
    background: #282828 !important;}
        
/** #282828 !important **/
.social-tools
 {
    background-color: #282828 !important;}
          
/** transparent **/
.thumbnail,
.stage {
    background: transparent;}          

/***** font color ******************************************/

/** #ccc **/
textarea.rating_textbox-textarea.clearfix::placeholder,
#movies_sidebar .nav-tabs > li.active > a, 
#movies_sidebar .nav-tabs > li:hover > a,  
#zerglayout > div > div > div.zergheadline > a[style], 
#pb-story .text-editor-viewer .ql-editor, 
#contentReviews > h2 > a, 
#scorePanel span.subtle,
#homepage-spotlight1 h3, 
#homepage-spotlight2 h3,
#seasonList .seasonItem a,
.panel-rt.panel .panel-heading, 
.panel-rt .panel-heading, 
.panel-rt > .panel-heading, 
.videoSection .panel-heading,
body,
h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .h1, .h2, .h3, .h4, .h5, .h6,  
input, button, select, textarea  
a.articleLink,
p, li, .form-control,
a.unstyled,
.panel-heading a,
.btn-secondary-rt,
.hoverBubble .title,
.thumbs-1r .syndicatedItem .video-title,
.newsItem .bannerCaption .panel-body .title,
.btn-default,
.navbar-rt .navbar-nav .menuHeader.showMenu > a,
.navigator-menu > li > a,
.navbar-rt .navbar-nav .menuHeader .dropdown-menu a,
.navbar-rt .navbar-nav .menuHeader .dropdown-menu .subnav h2.title,
.black,
.trendingBar li a, 
.trendingBar li a:before,
.Tepisodes h3, .Tepisodes .epis-info h4,
.Tepisodes .epis-main .epis-meter,
.movie_list a,
.line,
.navbar.navbar-rt #menu .menuHeader:hover,
.VideosCarousel__video-title,
.FullscreenSearch--desktop .FullscreenSearch__result-text-line-1, 
.FullscreenSearch--desktop .FullscreenSearch__result-text-line-2,
.mb-movies.list-view .mb-movie .movie_info .consensus .consensus-text,
.headline.headlineItem .bannerCaption .panel-body .title, 
.headline .headlineItem .bannerCaption .panel-body .title,
.countdown-index span,
.userDropdown.dropdown .dropdown-menu li.header-top-bar-item a,
.subtle:not(.start-year),
.home-news-article-link,
.search-section-title {
	color: #ccc !important;}     

/** #FA320A **/
#dvd-affliate-links a,
.title em,
.cfpItem p,
.redDot li a i {
   color: #FA320A !important;}

/** #343434**/
span.tMeterScore,
.navbar-rt .navbar-nav .menuHeader .dropdown-menu .subnav table.movie_list .tMeterScore {
    color: #888 !important;}

/** #2f8cb7 **/
.freshPicks li a,
a, .a {
	color: #2f8cb7;}

/***** Misc ****************************************************/
img[src="https://d2a5cgar23scu2.cloudfront.net/static/images/redesign/actor.default.tmb.gif"],
img[src="https://staticv2-4.rottentomatoes.com/static/images/redesign/user.none.tmb.jpg"] {
    filter: invert(90%);}
.container { width: 100%;}
.row {margin-left: -10px; margin-right: -10px;  height: 100%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center;}
.news-article-title { color: #ccc}
.dropdown-menu {display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center;}
#banner + .row {padding-top: 0px}
.col-center {top: -190px}
#banner .headlineItem .bannerCaption, .trendingBar + .banner .headlineItem .bannerCaption {background: #3d3d3dba !important}
}

@-moz-document regexp("(?=.*base=default&f=rottentomatoes).*") {
.post-content .post-message p {
    color: #ccc !important;}
}
